entry.content:
Services

Advisory & Implementation. We support you in the implementation of your IT security and stand by your side with know-how and experience.

Training. Expand your technical and organizational know-how and create more security awareness among your employees.

Compliance. Is your business is considered critical infrastructure? Do you need to comply with any regulatory framework before the next funding round? We help you to achieve any objective.

Certification. Build trust and verify information security with official certification. We accompany you through the audit. No matter if ISO 27001, SOC/2, or PCI-DSS. 

Audit. We carry out internal audits for you, at your premises or at your suppliers. And we provide potential for improvement with concrete recommendations.

GDPR. We help your business in all matters for GDPR compliance.
